code: import axios from"axios";export var loadSuggestions=function loadSuggestions(){return function(dispatch){axios.get("/api/search/bookmarks/data").then(function(response){dispatch({type:"MAYBE_UPDATE_SUGGESTIONS",suggestions:response.data.searchResult});});};};export var updateStarred=function updateStarred(object){return function(dispatch){axios.post("api/update/bookmarks",{obj:object}).then(function(){dispatch({type:"UPDATE_STARRED",object:object});dispatch(loadSuggestions());});};};
